title.narrative: SOCIAL PROTECTION

description.narrative: Social protection system is strengthened with reinforced national capacity and more equitable, child and gender-sensitive, efficient, fiscally sustainable and shock-responsive social protection instruments, which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Access To Inclusive Social Protection (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2023 more vulnerable children benefit from social inclusion interventions guided by high-quality analysis on the policy environnment and public spending and strengthened by institutional support.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Social protection system is strengthened with reinforced national capacity and more equitable, child and gender-sensitive,efficient, fiscally sustainable and shock-responsive social protection instruments

description.narrative: Support for strengthening key building blocks of an integrated,shock-responsiveand comprehensive social protection system included technical expertise for the implementation of the national Social Protection Policy and the Government flagship cash transfer programme (Merankabandi); innovative approaches developed to support households affected by floods; and national capacity-building and advocacy. As a result,61,000 households, including an estimated at 306,195 children, benefited from UNICEF-supported social protection programmes; the first steps were taken towards setting up a social protection registry, and;the Government started planning the extension of the national social safety net programme. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/12/2021
